DOC.brief_summary: This project develop culturally sensitive feasible self- family-management intervention assist HIV+ Chinese woman family manage illness improve quality life clinical outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Self- Family-management Intervention HIV+ Chinese Women
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct 3 phase . Phase 1 : The PI conduct secondary qualitative analysis in-depth interview illuminate sociocultural family context HIV+ Chinese woman . The data obtain three previous project conduct China 2005 2011 . Phase 2 : The PI develop adapt theory-driven , culturally sensitive feasible intervention improve quality life clinical outcome HIV+ Chinese woman family . Phase 3 : The PI conduct feasibility , compliance , acceptability study self- family-management intervention HIV+ woman family member .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion HIV+ woman . least 18 year age , able give inform consent study cognitively participate , receive clinical care Ditan Hospital SPHCC , diagnose HIV within past 12 month , disclose status least one family member willing invite family member intervention , well enough attend counsel session hospital , able attend followup visit hospital . Inclusion criterion family member . 18 year age , able give inform consent study cognitively participate , female family member HIV+ , currently receive clinical care Ditan Hospital SPHCC , family member take care female HIV+ family member , well enough attend counsel session hospital , able attend followup visit hospital . Exclusion criterion HIV+ woman history affective illness depression bipolar disease , age 18 , unwilling unable bring family member participate study . Exclusion criterion family member . history affective illness depression bipolar disease , age 18 , unwilling unable come HIV+ family member participate study .
